synopsis.text: Moa's protective older brother, Torii Shoutarou, finds himself playing detective as he trails her on a date in the first half of this two-part OVA. The second half unfolds on Christmas Eve, where Mitsuki, Yuuya, and their friends gather at Kanzaki's house for a festive celebration filled with eccentric costumes and unforgettable moments. This exclusive episode, not suitable for TV broadcast, is a special addition to the limited-edition 7th volume of the manga "Recently, My Sister Is Unusual". Prepare for a rollercoaster of sibling bonds, holiday cheer, and a dash of the unusual in this exciting anime adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
